law.history: Repealed 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 45, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 207, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 20(2). -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 269, sec. 5. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 10. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 17. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 9. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 4. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 43, effective June 15, 1950.
